content.query:
create TABLE salescsv (
    sale_id NVARCHAR(100),
    product_id NVARCHAR(100),
    product_name NVARCHAR(100),
    quality int,
    price float,
    total_amount float, 
    sales_date DATE,
    region NVARCHAR(100)

)

-- This is auto-generated code
Insert into salesdatacsv(sale_id,product_id ,
    product_name,
    quality ,
    price ,
    total_amount , 
    sales_date ,
    region)
SELECT *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://datalake5hueysr.dfs.core.windows.net/files/sales_data/poscsv/**',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = True
    ) AS [result]
